name: Exterminate the Vermin
description: Clear out the infestation of rats in the abandoned warehouse.

dialogue.describe: Those pesky rats are getting out of hand.  We need someone to deal with them.
dialogue.offer: There's an abandoned warehouse a couple blocks over that's become overrun with rats.  If you could clear out at least five of those vermin, we'd be much obliged.
dialogue.advice: They're just rats, any blunt weapon should do the trick.
dialogue.success: You got rid of all those rats? You're a lifesaver!
dialogue.success_lie: Don't lie to me, I can still hear them squeaking!
dialogue.failure: Well, I guess those rats are our problem now...
